title: PLAYSTATION THE OFFICIAL MAGAZINE FONT
content:
Hope someone can help.

This font is from the front cover of  
PLAYSTATION THE OFFICIAL MAGAZINE.

Number 1  
The words DARKNESS and the sub heading is a thinner version of it.  
 [http://cache.kotaku.com/assets/resources/2007/10/opmus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/cache.kotaku.com/assets/resources/2007/10/opmus.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [opm-0606-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/typophile.com/files/opm-0606-1.jpg) | 304.52 KB |
author: djnippa

comments.content:
#2 is United Serif, probably the Regular Medium weight:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts")

Wow Marcox, you are truly brilliant. Thankyou so much. I've just purchased it.

I design fonts on fontstruct.  
 [http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructors/djnippa/public](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructors/djnippa/public)

If there are any 'PAYPAL' only ones that you want please drop me an email, and I'll send them to you for FREE.

djnippa (at) hotmail (dot) com

So that's one down, and one to go.

Number 1  
The words DARKNESS and the sub heading is a thinner version of it.  
 [http://cache.kotaku.com/assets/resources/2007/10/opmus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/cache.kotaku.com/assets/resources/2007/10/opmus.jpg "http://cache.kotaku.com/assets/resources/2007/10/opmus.jpg")

I'm very pleased to announce that this elusive font has just been found, by one of my colleagues on Fontstruct.

It's called Community Service available for $89 from [http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0007](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0007 "http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0007")

I'd lost all hope and decided (back in June 2009) to design my own version.  
 [http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/ncd\_psmagazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/ncd_psmagazine "http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/ncd\_psmagazine")

This is the Upper Case

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NCD_PSMagazine1_4738.jpg)

And my lower case (which is very different from Community Service's

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810003909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NCD_PSMagazine2_5413.jpg)
